pages.text: $(li)The Piercing enchantment can be applied in a Crossbow, Pickarang, or Flamerang.$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows projectiles to pierce through mobs, that can be used to hit more enemies.
pages.title: Piercing

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Piercing).
